Charr Class Reference

Wrapper of a char* in order to store char* in STL containers. Otherwise, weird memory likages happen, if not simply a segfault. More...

char * car

Detailed Description

Wrapper of a char* in order to store char* in STL containers. Otherwise, weird memory likages happen, if not simply a segfault.
